column4: hello, I want to mount my cdrom in ubuntu, I inserted a CD, and mounted it, but it says that /dev/hdc dont exists
we heard you the first time
are you sure that your cdrom is /dev/hdc?
Often it mounts auto, but few times (I use UBUNTU with GTK) it doesnt mount it, and in the terminal it says that no /dev/hdc, nor hdd, nor hdb (hda for the hard drive)
